definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: pour forth in floods, flood away (As. zarâmu, overwhelm, VR:36, 57 c Dl:Pr 73 & in Zim:BP 119)—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 2 ms. sf. [[זְרַמְתָּם]] Ps 90:5 thou floodest them with rain, sweepest them (men) away.

definitions.title: Po.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 pl. [[זׁ֫רְמוּ מַ֫יִם עָבוֹת]] Ps 77:18 the cloud masses (Che) poured forth water.
